cold_start_message.text: Welcome to the Survey Bot survey 1!

q1.text: What is your name, age, email, and course?

q2.text: Was there any problem in your course?

q3.text: Are you going to join another course?

q4.text: What courses would you like to join?

q6.text: how many hours did you spent in this course ?.

q8.text: How would you rate the overall experience with our Customer Support Team? Please note that 5 means very well and 1 stands for very bad.

end_message.text: Thank you for completing the survey!
